Richard A Rivera
Visual Effects and Motion Design Multimedia Artist
July 7, 2010, Ken was a client of Richard A’S

Richard was an integral part of our production team for almost two years!  Starting first as an intern and swiftly becoming a full time employee, we were happy to facilitate his growth in the video and film production business.  Richard grew like a weed, gaining knowledge and high accolades as a P.A., climbing into the position of a graphic and 3d designer, and doing a little bit of everything from dubbing TV spots to digital file management to managing our fleet of interns.  Goal motivated, both a good leader and follower, and an overall fantastic team member, Richard gets 2 thumbs up from Spectrum Video and Film!  We look forward to seeing where he goes in the future.

summary: After 30 years experience building a business from scratch and millions of dollars of successful productions, Ken knows the value of a client’s budget and where to put the dollars for highest production value. Ken’s vast knowledge of hi-tech equipment, multi-media formats,camera techniques, editing, design and how that translates on the screen is priceless.Management for network and broadcast projects - documentaries, news, television shows and infomercials from script to screen.Managed all aspects of visual corporate communication for multiple companies, producing profiles, safety, training, new product, environmental, monthly and quarterly video newsletters.Management for technical staging for corporate meetings and events, including the 2014-2015 Fiesta Bowl and 2014-2015 Cactus Bowl media days and post-game press conferences. Expertise in projection, lighting and sound logistics and safety. Engaged in executive presentation consulting including rehearsals with executive level people in Fortune 500 companies.
name: Ken Liljegren
title: President, Spectrum Video & Film Ltd.
